text: The collared antshrike (Thamnophilus bernardi) is a species of bird in the Thamnophilidae family. It is found in Ecuador and Peru. == References == * BirdLife International 2004. Thamnophilus bernardi. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 27 July 2007. * Brumfield, R. T., and S. V. Edwards. 2007. Evolution into and out of the Andes: a Bayesian analysis of historical diversification in Thamnophilus antshrikes. Evolution 61:346-367. == Other websites == *Image at ADW Category:Tyranni Category:Birds of South America
title: Collared antshrike
